subtasks.description: Create the character selection component: visual cards showing character name, avatar placeholder, and a voice‑preview button that plays a short sample. Ensure cards are responsive and dark‑mode friendly.
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: A Gradio component displays a grid of cards; clicking the preview button plays audio without errors. Layout adapts to mobile widths and respects the dark theme.

subtasks.description: Build the multi‑character scene setup: a drag‑and‑drop area where users can add selected characters to a scene canvas, rearrange their order, and remove them.
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Users can drag cards from the selection grid into the scene area, reorder via drag, and remove characters. The scene view updates instantly and works on both desktop and mobile browsers.

subtasks.description: Implement the voice‑cloning interface: a drag‑and‑drop zone for uploading an audio file, a button to trigger cloning, and a preview playback of the cloned voice.
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Audio files can be dropped or selected, the file is accepted without crashes, a “Clone Voice” button becomes enabled, and a preview button plays the generated voice sample. Errors are shown to the user if cloning fails.

subtasks.description: Develop the live chat view: display ongoing dialogue with speaker highlighting, an audio waveform visualizer for each utterance, and synchronized text that appears word‑by‑word. Include a hidden settings panel for LLM provider, TTS engine, and audio device selection.
